entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
